title: By the End of the Day
description: Josh is at odds with world. He hates his job and feels that his marriage is slipping away from him.As he set off that morning for another tedious day at work, he had left a bitter argument behind him. But by the end of the day, his life will have changed forever.A dark, urban, fast paced thriller from first time author, P. T. Marshall.
author: P.T.  Marshall
